overview: Poor abused Nora runs into privileged bored Beatrice while wandering onto the rich girl's family estate. Both girls notice the uncanny resemblance between each other, so they decide to switch places. However, trouble soon arises for both girls in their new roles.
tagline: A joyous hit, starring that delightful young star who leaped into fame in her very first picture, "PINK TIGHTS"
title: Rich Girl, Poor Girl
